info.title: Fantasy Premier League
info.description: Fantasy Premier League stats, events and league information

200.description: Returned if the request is successful.

get.description: This endpoint returns a managers (users) data from previous game weeks (current), previous seasons (past), and chips that already used during this season. You need to provide the Manager ID.

parameters.name: manager_id
parameters.description: Provide the Manager ID for the manager of who you wish to gather history

200.description: Returned if the request is successful.

entry_can_leave.description: Head to head entry can leave

entry_can_admin.description: Head to head entry can admin

entry_can_invite.description: Head to head entry can invite

has_cup.description: Head to head has a cup

entry_last_rank.description: Head to head entry last rank

get.description: This returns the managers basic information such as leagues joined, favorite team, first and last names

parameters.name: manager_id
parameters.description: Provide the Manager ID for the manager of who you wish to gather basic information

200.description: Returned if the request is successful.

get.description: This endpoint returns a list of players information in that specific Gameweek.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: Provide the game week number as the event ID to get that weeks live data

200.description: Returned if the request is successful.

team_h_score.description: Game week history home team score

team_a_score.description: Game week history away team score

season_name.description: Game week history past season name

element_code.description: Game week history past season element code

start_cost.description: Game week history past season start cost

end_cost.description: Game week history past season end cost

total_points.description: Game week history past season total points

minutes.description: Game week history past season minutes

goals_scored.description: Game week history past season goals scored

assists.description: Game week history past season assists

clean_sheets.description: Game week history past season clean sheets

goals_conceded.description: Game week history past season goals conceded

own_goals.description: Game week history past season own goals

penalties_saved.description: Game week history past season penalties saved

penalties_missed.description: Game week history past season penalties missed

yellow_cards.description: Game week history past season yellow cards

red_cards.description: Game week history past season red cards

saves.description: Game week history past season saves

bonus.description: Game week history past season bonus

bps.description: Game week history past season bonus points

influence.description: Game week history past season influence

creativity.description: Game week history past season creativity

threat.description: Game week history past season threat

ict_index.description: Game week history past season ICT index

get.description: This endpoint returns a players detailed information divided into 3 sections; fixtures, current league history and previous years history

parameters.name: element_id
parameters.description: Provide the Element ID (player number) for the player who you wish to gather information on

200.description: Returned if the request is successful.

get.description: This endpoint returns a JSON array which contains every fixture of the season.

200.description: Returned if the request is successful.

get.description: This endpoint returns general information about the Fantasy Premier League

200.description: Returned if the request is successful.

event_total.description: Classic league standings results event total

player_name.description: Classic league standings results player name

last_rank.description: Classic league standings results last rank

rank_sort.description: Classic league standings results rank sort

entry_name.description: Classic league standings results entry name

get.description: This action allows you to return information on a Classic League in Fantasy Premier League with a league ID

parameters.name: league_id
parameters.description: Provide the League ID for the league you want to retireve information on
